description: Telltale Games was an American video game developer that published several popular series, including Sam & Max, The Walking Dead, and Game of Thrones: A Telltale Game Series. Many of Telltale's games use game data archives saved in the TTARCH format.
Later Telltale games used archives saved in the .TTARCH2 format. Player-created TTARCH extraction tools can extract assets from both TTARCH and TTARCH2 files.
